items.name: Viper Curio
explicitMods: 4% chance to receive additional Essences when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
22% chance in Heists for Jeweller's Orbs to drop as Orbs of Fusing instead
10% increased Rarity of Items dropped in Heists
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this
